resources.string: Album artist as artist with fallback (Spotify)
Parse title with fallback (YouTube Music etc)

string.name: line_n
string.comment: %1$s is the line number, currently used in the context of Discord Rich Presence

resources.string: Fetch art from last.fm Now Playing if required

string.name: you_have_disabled
string.comment: %1$s= the name of a web service, e.g. Spotify, %2$s=the section name in settings screen where this setting can be found

resources.string: e.g. To replace Artist1 with Artist2 while keeping the rest of the metadata unchanged, enable only the artist field, and fill in the original and corrected artist values, leaving the other fields disabled.

string.name: edit_extract_track_example
string.comment: Do not translate artist, albumArtist, album, track, because the user has to enter them as it is. https://www.google.com/search?q=regex+named+capture+groups

resources.string: e.g. To extract metadata from the track field, if the track contains "Artist - Track", set the track regex to (?<artist>.*) - (?<track>.*)
Run the pano-scrobbler executable with one of these command line arguments, while an instance is already running.
For Tasker, use Action > SQL Query. Set the mode to "URI Formatted", put any name in "Variable Array" and URI to one of these.

string.name: automation_replace_app_id
string.comment: %1$s is the literal text package_name on Android, APP_ID or MPRIS_ID on desktop

resources.string: Replace %1$s with that of the app.

Already donated?
If you had donated $%1$d or more before %2$s, or did not get the automated email for some reason (check your spam folder too), send me a message on Ko-Fi or BuyMeACoffee with your email address and I will manually email the code to you.
Already purchased through Google Play?
According to Google Play's policies, purchases made through Google Play cannot be used for apps downloaded outside of Google Play.

WebView not loading? Do you have the required dependencies installed?
Arch: sudo pacman -S webkit2gtk-4.1
Debian: sudo apt install libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0
Fedora: sudo dnf install webkit2gtk4.1
You may need to set the environment variable WEBKIT_DISABLE_DMABUF_RENDERER=1 for some Nvidia drivers on Linux.
Windows: WebView2 provided by Microsoft Edge Chromium
This will enable library search and scrobble counts
